actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To establish a Bipartisan Commission on Social Security Reform.
short_title: Bipartisan Commission on Social Security Reform Act of 2001
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Bipartisan Commission on Social Security Reform Act of 2001 - Establishes in the legislative branch a Bipartisan Commission on Social Security Reform to design a single set of legislative and administrative recommendations for long-range reforms for: (1) restoring the solvency of the Social Security system; and (2) maintaining retirement income security in the United States.

titles.title: Bipartisan Commission on Social Security Reform Act of 2001
To establish a Bipartisan Commission on Social Security Reform.
